articles.title: Hungary passes anti-LGBTQ law effectively barring same-sex couples from adopting - CNN
articles.description: Hungary's parliament has voted to redefine the concept of "family" in the country's constitution, a move that will effectively bar same sex couples from adopting children. The move has been met with outcry from human rights groups and LGBTQ advocates.
